      Prints two card side in the same row
      Parameters:
      card1 - the card to be printed on the left
      BlackAndWhite1 - if true, the card1 will be printed in black and white
      card2 - the card to be printed on the right
      BlackAndWhite2 - if true, the card2 will be printed in black and white
